text: Easter Parade is a 1948 American musical movie directed by Charles Walters and starring Judy Garland, Fred Astaire, Peter Lawford, Ann Miller, Clinton Sundberg. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and won an Academy Award in 1949. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 musical movies Category:1940s family movies Category:1940s American musical movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Walters Category:Movies set in the 1910s
title: Easter Parade
